statistics.name: wins-losses
statistics.description: The number of times the pitcher was attributed with a win-The number of losses for a pitcher.

statistics.name: ERA
statistics.description: The average number of runs a pitcher yields per 9 innings thrown

statistics.name: strikeouts
statistics.description: The number of times the pitcher struck out a batter.

statistics.name: WHIP
statistics.displayName: Walks Plus Hits Per Inning Pitched
statistics.description: The number representing walks plus hits divided by innings pitched.

stats.name: points
stats.description: Relative value from the leader to determine the actual gamesBehind.

stats.name: divisionTied
stats.description: Whether team is tied for division lead

stats.name: magicNumberDivision
stats.description: Any combination of wins by the leader and losses by the trailing team for the leading team to win the division.

stats.name: magicNumberWildcard
stats.description: Any combination of wins by the leader and losses by the trailing team for the leading team to win the wildcard.

stats.name: wildCardPercent
stats.description: % chance of winning the Wild Card
